com.fsck.k9.mail
provides an interface for accessing and manipulating email messages stored on a mail server.
com.fsck.k9.mail.filter
provides classes for encoding, decoding, and manipulating data from streams in various formats.
com.fsck.k9.mail.helper
provides methods to encode and decode strings in UTF-8 format.
com.fsck.k9.mail.internet
provides classes for manipulating, encoding, decoding, and extracting data and text from MIME messages and parts.
com.fsck.k9.mail.message
provides classes for parsing and handling raw message headers and body parts for use in a message receiver.
com.fsck.k9.mail.oauth
provides interfaces and a class for supporting OAuth 2.0 authentication for API access.
com.fsck.k9.mail.power
provides an interface for creating and acquiring wake locks with logging and notification to monitor the acquire and release of the locks.
com.fsck.k9.mail.ssl
provides utilities for creating a secure and trusted connection to send and receive emails using SSL/TLS network connections.
com.fsck.k9.mail.store.imap
provides classes and interfaces which allow users to connect to an IMAP server and manipulate the emails contained within by parsing responses, setting flags, and more.
com.fsck.k9.mail.store.pop3

provides the necessary methods for interacting with a POP3 email server, including generating a formatted string of enabled POP3 features, reading characters from an input stream, creating and decoding a Pop3Store URI, retrieving messages, creating folders, deleting messages, and manipulating Pop3 mail messages.
com.fsck.k9.mail.store.webdav
provides classes which enable users to access and manipulate messages stored in a webDAV mail store.
com.fsck.k9.mail.store
provides an abstract class and an interface to enable applications to manage remote mail stores and their associated credentials.
